title: ’’We want Gota’’ protest underway in Colombo
body_lines: Several supporters of President Gotabaya Rajapaksa are presently conducting a rally in Kollupitiya carrying slogans "We want Gota" against the "Go Home Gota" protests which are presently underway in several areas.
The protestors are making their way towards the Presidential Secretariat in Kollupitiya carrying the national flag and calling out "We want Gota".
